Controllers¶

CLI Controller¶

Controller for managing CLI and database initialization operations

controllers.cli_controller.cleanup_database()[source]¶

Clean up duplicate entries in database.

Returns:

Cleanup completed successfully with count of removed items 500: Cleanup operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.cli_controller.create_tables()[source]¶

Create all database tables.

Returns:

Tables created successfully 500: Table creation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.cli_controller.drop_tables()[source]¶

Drop all database tables.

Returns:

Tables dropped successfully 500: Table drop operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.cli_controller.health_check()[source]¶

Check API health status.

Returns:

API is running with timestamp

Return type:

200

controllers.cli_controller.list_routes()[source]¶

List all available API routes.

Returns:

List of all registered routes and their methods

Return type:

200

controllers.cli_controller.seed_tables()[source]¶

Seed database with initial data.

Returns:

Database seeded successfully 500: Seeding operation failed

Return type:

200

Card Controller¶

Controller for managing Pokemon TCG card operations

controllers.card_controller.create_card()[source]¶

Create a new Pokemon card.

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the card cardtype_id (int): ID of the card type cardset_id (int): ID of the set this card belongs to

Returns:

Card created successfully 400: Missing required fields 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.card_controller.delete_card(card_id)[source]¶

Delete a specific Pokemon card.

Parameters:

card_id (int) – ID of the card to delete

Returns:

Card deleted successfully 404: Card not found 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.filter_by_multiple_sets()[source]¶

Filter cards by multiple set IDs.

Query Parameters:

sets (str): Comma-separated list of set IDs

Returns:

List of cards from specified sets 400: No set IDs provided 500: Filter operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.filter_by_multiple_types()[source]¶

Filter cards by multiple card types.

Query Parameters:

types (str): Comma-separated list of card types (e.g. fire,water)

Returns:

List of cards matching the specified types 400: No types provided 500: Filter operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.get_all_cards()[source]¶

Retrieve all Pokemon cards.

Returns:

List of all cards 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.get_one_card(card_id)[source]¶

Retrieve a specific Pokemon card by ID.

Parameters:

card_id (int) – ID of the card to retrieve

Returns:

Card details 404: Card not found 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.search_cards()[source]¶

Search for Pokemon cards using filters.

Search Parameters:

name (str, optional): Card name pattern to search for (case insensitive) cardtype (str, optional): Card type name pattern to filter by (case insensitive) cardset_id (int, optional): Exact set ID to filter by

Returns:

List of matching cards with their relationships 400: Invalid cardset_id format 500: Search operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.update_card(card_id)[source]¶

Update specific properties of a card.

Parameters:

card_id (int) – ID of the card to update

Request Body:

name (str, optional): New name for the card cardtype (str, optional): New type for the card cardset_id (int, optional): New set ID for the card

Returns:

Card updated successfully 404: Card not found 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.card_controller.validate_name(self, value)[source]¶

Validate card name length

controllers.card_controller.validate_set_id(self, value)[source]¶

Validate set ID is positive

controllers.card_controller.validate_type(self, value)[source]¶

Deck Controller¶

Controller for managing Pokemon TCG deck operations

controllers.deck_controller.create_deck()[source]¶

Create a new Pokemon TCG deck.

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the deck description (str, optional): Description of the deck format_id (int): ID of the format this deck follows deckbox_id (int): ID of the deckbox to contain this deck

Returns:

Deck created successfully 400: Missing required fields or validation error 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.deck_controller.filter_by_rating()[source]¶

Filter decks by rating range.

Query Parameters:

min (float): Minimum rating max (float): Maximum rating

Returns:

List of decks within rating range 500: Filter operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.filter_decks_by_cardtype()[source]¶

Get decks filtered by card type distribution.

Returns:

Decks with their card type breakdowns 500: Filter operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.get_all_decks()[source]¶

Retrieve all Pokemon TCG decks.

Returns:

List of all decks 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.get_one_deck(deck_id)[source]¶

Retrieve a specific deck by ID.

Parameters:

deck_id (int) – ID of the deck to retrieve

Returns:

Deck details 404: Deck not found 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.get_top_rated_decks()[source]¶

Get highest rated decks.

Query Parameters:

limit (int): Number of decks to return (default 10)

Returns:

List of top rated decks 500: Query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.search_decks()[source]¶

Search and filter decks by format and rating.

Query Parameters:

format (str): Format name (standard, expanded) rating (int): Minimum rating threshold

Returns:

List of matching decks 500: Search operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.update_deck(deck_id)[source]¶

Update specific properties of a deck.

Parameters:

deck_id (int) – ID of the deck to update

Request Body:

name (str, optional): New name for the deck description (str, optional): New description format_id (int, optional): New format ID

Returns:

Deck updated successfully 404: Deck not found 400: Validation error 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

200

controllers.deck_controller.validate_deck(deck_id, format_id)[source]¶

Validate deck composition and format legality.

Parameters:

  • deck_id (int) – ID of deck to validate

  • format_id (int) – Format to validate against

Raises:

ValidationError – If deck violates any format or composition rules

controllers.deck_controller.validate_deck_rules(deck_id)[source]¶

Validate a deck’s composition and format legality.

Parameters:

deck_id (int) – ID of the deck to validate

Returns:

Deck is valid with details 404: Deck not found 500: Validation check failed

Return type:

200

DeckBox Controller¶

Controller for managing Pokemon TCG deck box operations

controllers.deckbox_controller.add_deck_to_deckbox(deckbox_id)[source]¶

Add a new deck to a deck box.

Parameters:

deckbox_id (int) – ID of the deck box to add deck to

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the new deck description (str, optional): Description of the deck format (str): Format of the deck

Returns:

Deck added successfully 404: Deck box not found 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.deckbox_controller.create_deckbox()[source]¶

Create a new deck box.

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the deck box description (str, optional): Description of the deck box

Returns:

Deck box created successfully 400: Invalid input data 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.deckbox_controller.delete_deckbox(deckbox_id)[source]¶

Parameters:

deckbox_id (int) – ID of the deck box to delete

Returns:

Deck box deleted successfully 404: Deck box not found 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

200

Parameters:

deckbox_id (int) – ID of the deckbox to filter decks from

Query Parameters:

format (str): Filter by deck format name (str): Filter by deck name

Returns:

Filtered list of decks 404: Deckbox not found 500: Filter operation failed

Return type:

200

CardSet Controller¶

Controller for managing Pokemon TCG card set operations

controllers.cardset_controller.create_set()[source]¶

Create a new card set.

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the set release_date (date): Release date of the set description (str): Description of the set

Returns:

Set created successfully 409: Set with name already exists 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.cardset_controller.delete_set(cardset_id)[source]¶

Delete a specific Pokemon card set.

Parameters:

cardset_id (int) – ID of the set to delete

Returns:

Set deleted successfully 404: Set not found

Return type:

200

Returns:

List of all sets 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

controllers.cardset_controller.get_card_distribution()[source]¶

Returns:

Card distribution statistics per set 500: Database query failed

Return type:

200

Return type:

200

Format Controller¶

Controller for managing Pokemon TCG game format operations

controllers.format_controller.create_format()[source]¶

Create a new game format.

Request Body:

name (str): Name of the format description (str): Description of format rules

Returns:

Format created successfully 400: Missing required fields 409: Format name already exists 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

201

controllers.format_controller.delete_format(format_id)[source]¶

Delete a specific format.

Parameters:

format_id (int) – ID of the format to delete

Returns:

Format deleted successfully 404: Format not found 500: Database operation failed

Return type:

200

List of all formats 500: Database query failed

Parameters:

format_id (int) – ID of the format to update

Request Body:

name (str, optional): New name for the format description (str, optional): New description

Returns:

Return type:

200

controllers.format_controller.validate_format_legality(format_id)[source]¶

Validate deck legality for a specific format.

Parameters:

format_id (int) – Format to validate against

Request Body:

deck_id (int): ID of deck to validate

Returns:

Deck is legal in format 400: Deck violates format rules 404: Format not found 500: Validation failed

Return type:

200
